dict.acceptation: 碎片；缺口；（作赌注用的）筹码；（足球）高球；
刻，削成；凿；从…上削下一小片；

sent.orig: In all my meetings, one term has arisen time and again: SOC, or system-on-a-chip.
sent.trans: 在所有的交谈中，有一个词多次出现：SOC,也就是“单芯片系统”(system-on-a-chip)。

sent.orig: Due to CMOS image sensors' full compatibility with CMOS technology, the time of camera-on-chip is coming.
sent.trans: CMOS图像传感器和标准CMOS工艺完全兼容的优点使得片上相机(camera-on-chip)时代就要来临。

sent.orig: The chips are CY7C64613 chip, EEPROM chip and RS232 interface chip.
sent.trans: 这三个芯片是CY7C64613芯片、EEPROM芯片和RS232接口芯片。

sent.orig: The equipment transports the powder chip, pellet chip and short chip of metallic and nonmetallic.
sent.trans: 本装置主要用于输送切削下来的金属、非金属材料的粉状、颗粒状和较短的切屑。

sent.orig: Among them the system uses 51 chip computer to initialize the encode chip and decode chip.
sent.trans: 其中编码芯片、解码芯片通过51单片机进行初始化配置。
